sql:
SELECT 
  Date,
  Time,
  "Consumption_UnitPrice[EUR/kWh]" AS price_no_tax,
  "Solar_Production_Estimate[kW]" AS solar_production,
  "Consumption[kWh]" AS solar_consumption
FROM data
WHERE Date = date('now') OR Date = date('now', '+1 day')
